text: @DavidJUrban @realDonaldTrump @HillaryClinton @JoeBiden The U.S. has less than 5% of the world’s population, but thanks to Trump and GOP leadership it has more 25% of the world’s COVID-19 cases and more than 20% of the world’s COVID-19 deaths.
